verses.name: Exodus 9:1
verses.text: Then the Lord said unto Moses, Go in unto Pharaoh, and tell him, Thus saith the Lord God of the Hebrews, Let my people go, that they may serve me.

verses.name: Exodus 9:2
verses.text: For if thou refuse to let them go, and wilt hold them still,

verses.name: Exodus 9:3
verses.text: Behold, the hand of the Lord is upon thy cattle which is in the field, upon the horses, upon the asses, upon the camels, upon the oxen, and upon the sheep: there shall be a very grievous murrain.
